languages.text: "Глейто, рядом. Если даже ведьма всполошилась, то впереди серьезные проблемы".
languages.translation_comment:
During Weisz's quest at the Astropathic Chapel.
Idira: "The whispers are yelping with delight. They always get so excited when they sense others like them nearby."

traits.locale_text: "Глейто, рядом. Если даже ведьма всполошилась, то впереди серьезные проблемы".

languages.text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
languages.translation_comment:
During Weisz's quest at the Astropathic Chapel.
Idira: "The whispers are yelping with delight. They always get so excited when they sense others like them nearby."
languages.original_text: "Глейто, рядом. Если даже ведьма всполошилась, то впереди серьезные проблемы".

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
"Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
"Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
"Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
"Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
"Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

languages.text: 「グライト、ついてこい。あの魔女ですら落ち着かない様子なら、何か厄介なことが起こるに違いない」
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「グライト、ついてこい。あの魔女ですら落ち着かない様子なら、何か厄介なことが起こるに違いない」

languages.text: "Glaito, bei Fuß. Wenn selbst die Hexe rastlos ist, droht uns wohl Ärger."
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, bei Fuß. Wenn selbst die Hexe rastlos ist, droht uns wohl Ärger."

languages.text: « Glaito, au pied. Si même la sorcière s'agite, c'est signe que nous allons au-devant d'ennuis. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito, au pied. Si même la sorcière s'agite, c'est signe que nous allons au-devant d'ennuis. »

languages.text: «Atento, Glaito. Si hasta la bruja está nerviosa, es que se avecinan problemas».
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Atento, Glaito. Si hasta la bruja está nerviosa, es que se avecinan problemas».

languages.text: “打起精神，格雷托。既然连那个女巫都坐立不安，那我们肯定是有麻烦了。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: “打起精神，格雷托。既然连那个女巫都坐立不安，那我们肯定是有麻烦了。”

languages.text: "Yakın dur Glaito. Cadı bile huylandığına göre bela yakındır."
languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Yakın dur Glaito. Cadı bile huylandığına göre bela yakındır."

languages.original_text: "Glaito, heel. If even the witch is restless, then we must be headed for trouble."
